data.actual_result: The word "Enter" is added to the input and the message isn't sent
data.expected_result: The message is sent with the text that was still there
data.short_description: The word 'Enter' is added to the input when pressing enter
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can manage roles - Type something in the message box (don't send) - Open server settings, edit a role and save changes - Close settings with the (X) - Press enter to send your message
